CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH(Proposed_Effective_Date__c)=2 && DAY(Proposed_Effective_Date__c)=29, DATE(YEAR(Proposed_Effective_Date__c)+1, 2, 28), DATE(YEAR(Proposed_Effective_Date__c)+1, MONTH(Proposed_Effective_Date__c), DAY(Proposed_Effective_Date__c)) )
CustomField.label: Proposed Expiration Date
